homePage.taskNameTooltip: Task name or /ai to open AI...

settings.tipDescription: Click on {{taskCompleted}} or {{taskCreated}} to see the progress of an element.
settings.disableAutoClose: Disables the auto-close of the settings panel.

popUps.errorInvalidTaskName: Invalid task name. Please enter a valid name.
popUps.invalidVersionFormat: Invalid version format. Please enter a valid format.
popUps.dataReset: Data successfully reset. The app will be restarted soon.
popUps.markCategoryComplete: Are you sure to mark complete the following category?
popUps.invalidCharacters: Invalid Company name. At least 8 characters.
popUps.changeCompanyName: Are you sure to change the company name to
popUps.descriptionAutoClose: If enabled, this option will disables the auto-close of the settings panel.
popUps.characterLimit: If enabled, this option will set a character limit for Task names and version numbers.
popUps.doubleTap: When enabled, enables double-tap control on the Category button, allowing for faster category switching.
popUps.resetDataConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset all data saved?
popUps.restartConfirm: Are you sure you want to restart the app?
popUps.quitAppConfirm: Are you sure you want to close the app?
